paramagpy.protein.CustomAtom.csa¶

property CustomAtom.csa¶

Get the CSA tensor at the nuclear position This uses the geometry of neighbouring atoms and a standard library from Bax J. Am. Chem. Soc. 2000

Returns

matrix – the CSA tensor in the PDB frame if appropriate nuclear positions are not available <None> is returned.

Return type

3x3 array
